languages.text: {n}Арлекин начинает стягивать рогатую маску, будто бы собираясь раскрыть что скрывается под ней, но, прежде, чем вы успеваете уловить его черты, ксенос со смешком растворяется в синем мареве. Там, где он только что стоял, остается прощальный подарок загадочного ксеноса.{/n}

{n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арлекин начинает стягивать рогатую маску, будто бы собираясь раскрыть что скрывается под ней, но, прежде, чем вы успеваете уловить его черты, ксенос со смешком растворяется в синем мареве. Там, где он только что стоял, остается прощальный подарок загадочного ксеноса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin starts taking off his mask like he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin starts taking off his mask like he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

languages.text: {n}丑角摘下了面具，仿佛要让你看清面具之下的面孔，但你还没来得及辨认他的容貌，他就大笑起来，消失在蓝色的雾霾之中。这位神秘异形刚刚站着的地方，只剩下他留给你的临别赠礼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角摘下了面具，仿佛要让你看清面具之下的面孔，但你还没来得及辨认他的容貌，他就大笑起来，消失在蓝色的雾霾之中。这位神秘异形刚刚站着的地方，只剩下他留给你的临别赠礼。{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin beginnt, seine Maske abzusetzen, als würde er preisgeben, was darunter liegt. Doch bevor du sein Gesicht sehen kannst, lacht er und verschwindet in einem blauen Dunst. Wo eben noch der mysteriöse Xenos stand, bleibt nur sein Abschiedsgeschenk zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin beginnt, seine Maske abzusetzen, als würde er preisgeben, was darunter liegt. Doch bevor du sein Gesicht sehen kannst, lacht er und verschwindet in einem blauen Dunst. Wo eben noch der mysteriöse Xenos stand, bleibt nur sein Abschiedsgeschenk zurück.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

languages.text: {n}El arlequín empieza a quitarse la máscara como si estuviese a punto de revelar lo que hay debajo, pero antes de que logres distinguir sus facciones, se ríe y desaparece en una humareda azul. Donde antes se hallaba el misterioso xenos ya solo queda su regalo de despedida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El arlequín empieza a quitarse la máscara como si estuviese a punto de revelar lo que hay debajo, pero antes de que logres distinguir sus facciones, se ríe y desaparece en una humareda azul. Donde antes se hallaba el misterioso xenos ya solo queda su regalo de despedida.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin commence à retirer son masque comme pour révéler ce qu'il dissimule, mais avant que vous ne puissiez distinguer son visage, il éclate de rire puis disparaît dans une brume bleue. Là où se tenait le mystérieux xénos, il ne reste que son cadeau d'adieu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin commence à retirer son masque comme pour révéler ce qu'il dissimule, mais avant que vous ne puissiez distinguer son visage, il éclate de rire puis disparaît dans une brume bleue. Là où se tenait le mystérieux xénos, il ne reste que son cadeau d'adieu.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンはその下に何があるのかを明らかにしようとするかのように仮面を取り始めたが、その容貌がわかる前に、彼は笑って青い靄の中に消えてしまった。謎めいた異種族が立っていた場所には、彼の餞別が残っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンはその下に何があるのかを明らかにしようとするかのように仮面を取り始めたが、その容貌がわかる前に、彼は笑って青い靄の中に消えてしまった。謎めいた異種族が立っていた場所には、彼の餞別が残っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion

languages.text: {n}Arleken, yüzünü gösterecekmiş gibi maskesini çıkarmaya başlıyor ama sen yüzünü göremeden gülüp mavi bir sisin içinde kayboluyor. Gizemli zenonun dikildiği yerde şimdi bir ayrılık hediyesi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin begins taking off his mask, as if he is about to reveal what is beneath it, but before you can make out his features, he laughs and vanishes in a blue haze. Where the mysterious xenos just stood, his parting gift remains.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, yüzünü gösterecekmiş gibi maskesini çıkarmaya başlıyor ama sen yüzünü göremeden gülüp mavi bir sis içinde kayboluyor. Gizemli zenonun dikildiği yerde şimdi bir ayrılık hediyesi duruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HarlequinZanni_Companion
